text: Stewart Robert "Bob" Einstein (November 20, 1942 â€“ January 2, 2019) was an American actor, comedy writer and producer. He was born in Los Angeles, California. He was best known for creating and performing the satirical stuntman character Super Dave Osborne. Einstein was also known for his roles as Marty Funkhouser in Curb Your Enthusiasm and Larry Middleman on Arrested Development. His younger brother was actor Albert Brooks. Einstein died on January 2, 2019 from leukemia in Indian Wells, California at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bob Einstein Official Website * Category:American Emmy Award winners Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Comedians from Los Angeles
title: Bob Einstein
